logo.margins: Space of one 'e' letter around the logo

donts: Do not use aqua tones on red background
Do not use Moonstone over Celeste
Do not use unapproved color variations

style.backgrounds: Gradients from white to antiFlashWhite or aqua tones
style.cta: Use TechHead font and red (Folly) for emphasis
style.bodyText: Use Roboto for all other text
